name: Dongdong
desc: A resident of Qingce Village. After hearing about the many strange and wonderful voyages in his father's letters, he's decided to follow in his footsteps and join The Crux as well when he's old enough.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
According to sailors who have undertaken long voyages, there once was a group of brutal and fierce soldiers on the far seas who inflicted havoc wherever they went. Yet, one day they were finally punished by someone stronger than they...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: You will be using "Surprise Deck: Blazing Blast" to engage in this challenge instead of your usual deck.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Raiden Shogun
customize.desc:
"Plane of Euthymia" Raiden Shogun

The tranquil thunder shall scatter this world most ephemeral.

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc:
"Exquisite Delicacy" Xiangling

As a chef, she is practically omnipotent.

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc:
"Sprout of Rebirth" Collei

"'Shouting the name of your card loudly will increase its power many-fold'… You've got to be kidding, right?"

customize.name: Wishes Unnumbered
customize.desc:
Raiden Shogun: Wishes Unnumbered

Shine down, baleful omen!

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc:
Timeless Dream: Engulfing Lightning

The naginata was a lethal weapon by which scattered dross might be cut away.

And the one who wielded that naginata was one who guarded the path to eternity.

customize.name: Adeptus' Temptation
customize.desc:
Adeptus' Temptation

It is said that this name was derived from this dish's ability to tempt an adeptus to return to the mortal realm. But that begs the question… Which adeptus was that?

customize.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
customize.desc:
Lotus Flower Crisp

Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer… A pleasing sight indeed.

customize.name: Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc:
Mushroom Pizza

They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it…

customize.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
customize.desc:
Teyvat Fried Egg

With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

Take care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

value.name: Milk
value.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.
